org.chronos.chronodb.internal.impl

Interface IBranchMetadata

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BranchMetadata, BranchMetadata2

    public interface IBranchMetadata
    A common interface for branch metadata objects.

    Instances of this class should always be treated as immutable value objects.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static IBranchMetadata create(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String parentName, long branchingTimestamp, java.lang.String directoryName)
      Creates a new IBranchMetadata object.
      static IBranchMetadata createMasterBranchMetadata()
      Creates the branch metadata object for the master branch.
      long getBranchingTimestamp()
      Returns the branching timestamp, i.e. the point in time when this branch was branched away from the parent.
      java.lang.String getDirectoryName()
      Returns the name of the OS directory where this branch is stored.
      java.lang.String getName()
      Returns the name of the branch.
      java.lang.String getParentName()
      Returns the name of the parent branch.

    • Method Detail

      • createMasterBranchMetadata

        static IBranchMetadata createMasterBranchMetadata()
        Creates the branch metadata object for the master branch.
        Returns:
        The branch metadata object for the master branch. Never null.

      • create

        static IBranchMetadata create(java.lang.String name,
                              java.lang.String parentName,
                              long branchingTimestamp,
                              java.lang.String directoryName)
        Creates a new IBranchMetadata object.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the branch. Must not be null.
        parentName - The name of the parent branch. Must not be null, except if the name parameter is master.
        branchingTimestamp - The branching timestamp. Must not be negative.
        directoryName - The name of the directory where the branch is stored. May be null if the current Chronos backend does not support/use directory names for branches.
        Returns:
        The branch metadata object. Never null.

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        Returns the name of the branch.
        Returns:
        The branch name. Never null.

      • getParentName

        java.lang.String getParentName()
        Returns the name of the parent branch.
        Returns:
        The parent branch name. May be null if the current branch is the master branch.

      • getBranchingTimestamp

        long getBranchingTimestamp()
        Returns the branching timestamp, i.e. the point in time when this branch was branched away from the parent.
        Returns:
        The branching timestamp. Will always be greater than or equal to zero.

      • getDirectoryName

        java.lang.String getDirectoryName()
        Returns the name of the OS directory where this branch is stored.

        This property may not be available on all backends. Backends that do not support this property should return null.

        Returns:
        The name of the directory where the branch data is located. May be null if unsupported.
        Since:
        0.6.0
